item.title: [HELP] How to change xp from att str and def? Delta Source
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

Then maybe you changed it for a different stat, keep searching “exprate”.

TotalExp = (double)(1500*hitDiff);

Change the 1500 or whatever other number it may be to the amount of exp you want to be given.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] How to change xp from att str and def? Delta Source
item.dc:creator: @k0j0e k0j0e
item.description:
@k0j0e wrote:

and what do i change…

i see that

double TotalExp = 0;
if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) {
TotalExp = (double)(1500hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 2);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(1500hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(1500hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double)(1000hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
attackTimer = 7;

i reduced the TotalExp = (double)(1500*hitDiff); and it do nothing…

i reduced the addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 2); and it do nothing…

what i do?

Read full topic
